title: Only 0.02% of Stock Bids Are Awarded in China IPO Market Frenzy
description: Trying to get a piece of a new listing in China has always been a long shot, but this year it has become a near-impossible feat.
content: Trying to get a piece of a new listing in China has always been a long shot, but this year it has become a near-impossible feat.
